ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m just giving advice.  You can ask Mr. McQuaid, he ll be glad to inform you that EQ is a game. I ve been called everything from a stupid college student
ygData.messageBody:
>
>
> From: Crysarra de'Danann <lucretia_71@...>
>
> Oh how wrong you are. You don't know me..you don't know my life you
> don't know jack as far as I am concerned. You are probably some stupid
> college student who thinks that everyone has a life outside of the
> game. Some of us choose not to and you know what??? I am happy that
> way. I don't want to engage in the activities I did before EQ and you
> know what else? its not your place to tell me or anyone else what they
> should think or feel about EQ or to pass judgement on anyone for
> thinking the way they do about EQ.
>

I'm just giving advice. You can ask Mr. McQuaid, he'll be glad to
inform you that EQ is a game.

I've been called everything from a stupid college student with a life
to a cool dude teenager with no life.

I don't know if your attempt at guessing who/what I am was a joke or
some pathetic way to make you feel better or make me feel worse.

Anyway, quoth the Joker:
"I'm glad you're dead."
